readable.title: 2924483864_cfdb900a13
readable.content: A dog wearing the number 8 leads in a dog race . A greyhound with a yellow and black stripped jacked with a red number 8 on it is running on a track Muzzled greyhounds are racing along a dog track . Three greyhounds are in a dog race at the track . White dog with yellow and black # 8 jacket in front of pack of dogs in race
